I have a `hfun` which returns some html with a `a`-tag link to an external site. How can I tell Franklin that the link is indeed external? It seems to append the path to the current page to the beginning of the link. MWE:

```function hfun_mylink(params)
    return """
    <a href="www.google.com">google</a>
    """
end```
when I click the link on the webpage it tries to go to `path/to/current/page/<http://www.google.com|www.google.com>`
